mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dy_cash_flow a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0

SELECT
FROM dy_cash_flow a, sys_user b, dy_client c
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id} AND b.del_flag = '0' AND c.del_flag = '0' AND a.client_id = c.id AND b.id = c.broker_id

SELECT
FROM dy_cash_flow a, sys_user b, dy_client c
a.del_flag = '0' AND b.del_flag = '0' AND c.del_flag = '0' AND a.client_id = c.id AND b.id = c.broker_id
AND c.broker_id = #{brokerId}
AND b.name LIKE '%'||#{brokerName}||'%' '%'+#{brokerName}+'%' concat('%',#{brokerName},'%')
AND c.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND c.dyid = #{dyid}
AND a.operate_time >= STR_TO_DATE('${startTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND a.operate_time <= STR_TO_DATE('${endTime}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND a.operate = #{operate}
AND a.operate in ('微信充值','线下充值','提现')
AND a.confirm_result = #{confirmResult}
ORDER BY b.name ASC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY b.name DESC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.name ASC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.name DESC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.dyid ASC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.dyid DESC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.nickname ASC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY c.nickname DESC , FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by FIELD(a.confirm_result,'等待','处理中','完成','打回','已取消') , a.operate_time DESC

SELECT
FROM dy_cash_flow a, dy_client b, dy_finance c, sys_user d
a.del_flag = 0 AND b.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND d.del_flag = 0 AND a.client_id = b.id AND b.broker_id = d.id AND c.client_id = b.id AND a.create_by = #{brokerId} AND a.operate in ('微信充值','线下充值','提现')
ORDER BY a.operate_time DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT count(*) FROM dy_cash_flow a
a.del_flag = 0 AND a.confirm_result = '等待' AND a.operate in ('微信充值','线下充值','提现')
